name: Survey - Sufficient survey set out information is available.
Survey - Correct line and level for placement of concrete
Material Delivery - Items conform with the applicable Australian Standard/s
Comments / Records - Delivery Docket, Supplier’s Certificate of Compliance
Material Delivery - Items delivered with no visible signs of damage
Comments / Records - Delivery Docket, Supplier’s Certificate of Compliance
Pre-Pour Check (to be completed by Engineer or Supervisor)
Confirm Dimensions - Visual Check and Measure dimensions are correct for trench width or Thrust Block dimensions
Initial pour against ground - Surface free of water and soft spots
Initial pour against ground - Hardstand/ ground suitable for concrete pump location
Initial pour against ground - 50mm blinding UNO
Initial pour against ground - If for Thrust Block no loose Material
Construction joints & surfaces - Clean and free of laitance, scabble where required.

Reinforcement - Installed as per IFC drawings. Type, size, position, chairs, cover all as specified & within tolerance; laps and splices as specified. Extra tie wire on splice bars around construction joints and wedges fixed to support splice bars in stop end formwork.
Cast-in items, block outs and hold down bolts - Type, quantity and location as per design.
Final inspection - Pour arrangements agreed and equipment adequate
Final inspection - Surface free of water, dust, debris and stains.
Concrete Pour (to be completed by Engineer or Supervisor)
Correct Batch / Grade of Concrete - Visual Acceptance of the docket prior to pouring
Concrete quality - Visual assessment of quality - note details of any loads rejected
Concrete Testing (Vertical Crest Thrust Block) - 3 sample Cylinder taken (7day and 2 X 28 day tests)
Concrete Testing (All Other Concrete Pours) - 3 sample Cylinder taken (7day and 2 X 28 day tests)
Post Pour Check (to be completed by Engineer or Supervisor)
Curing of exposed surfaces - Exposed surfaces cured
Polyethylene sheeting (edges / laps sealed, 300mm min laps)
Water curing (continuous spraying, ponding, wet Hessian)
Location of embedment, hold down bolts and penetrations - All embedded items, hold down bolts and penetration located in accordance with drawings
Details of defects – cracking in slab pours and Inspection of repairs.
Finish concrete surfaces inspected by Supervisor. Within specification tolerances (≤ 0.2mm)
Repairs in accordance with approved specification.
Comments / Records - Type of surface finish:
Final inspection: All work completed accordance with applicable procedures, drawings, specifications and approved changes
